California decreta el estado de emergencia por la gripe aviar tras la confirmación de un paciente grave en Luisiana
por
Barney_77
a
elpais.com
____
publicado:
____
El gobernador de California, Gavin Newsom, ha decretado este miércoles el estado de emergencia después de que se confirmara el caso grave de gripe aviar en un paciente ingresado en un hospital de Luisiana. Es el primer caso con síntomas graves detectado en el país. El Departamento de Agricultura federal estima que en California, el Estado más poblado del país, hay unas 645 cabezas de ganado infectadas con el virus H5N1, detectado desde agosto pasado. La presencia
de la bacteria
del virus se puede rastrear al mes de marzo.

author: Chris Bayer
title: I saw Samsung's deluge of Neo QLED TVs releasing in 2025 - these features impressed me most
text:
A recent Samsung workshop gave me an up-close look at the company's 2025 Neo QLED TV lineup, and I walked away impressed. Kerry Wan/ZDNET
The TV launch season is upon us, and Samsung is among the first brands to put out its 2025 lineup of visual goodness. I recently had the opportunity to scope out some new TVs at one of Samsung's satellite laboratories in New Jersey, putting every upcoming model through the ringer and seeing just how well they stack up to the company's early-year claims.
Also: I spent hours testing Samsung's new flagship soundbar - it gave my Sonos a run for its money
Below are my initial takeaways (read: this isn't a review) on the company's Neo QLED 4K and 8K models, which are up for preorder now, as well as the new Vision AI features that underpin the 2025 viewing experience.
Samsung's 'Vision AI' is hard to deny
Kerry Wan/ZDNET
Unsurprisingly, a major emphasis at the workshop was Samsung's latest artificial intelligence tech, Vision AI, which is integrated into all the company's new TVs. While Vision AI's capabilities span the user experience, from browsing and searching to watching foreign movies, the following caught my attention the most.
Real-time subtitle translations
Are you a fan of foreign films? Sometimes, the most obscure (and best) international movies lack English subtitles. Vision AI is a near-instant translator for seven different languages on new Samsung TVs. While this isn't necessarily a new feature in tech -- several Android smartphones, including Samsung's own, already support live transcriptions -- the ability to do this from the comfort of your couch or bed is very useful.
Also: Having trouble hearing whispery TV dialogue? I found 3 ways to fix that
We have good reason to believe that number will expand after future updates since Samsung's latest mobile devices already support translation of 13 languages through its "Live Translate" feature.
Onscreen 'Click to Search'
I often find myself pausing a show to look up information on my iPhone to identify an actor, a set's filming location, or a song playing in the background.…
Chris Bayer

author: Syndicated Content
title: Ukraine gives more details of latest alleged killing of POWs
text:
KYIV (Reuters) – Ukraine’s Airborne Assault Troops said on Thursday that three servicemen who Ukrainian prosecutors have said were captured and shot dead by Russian forces this month were members of the 82nd Airborne Assault Brigade.
Russia has yet to comment on the allegation, the second accusation that it has killed prisoners of war leveled against it this month by Ukrainian prosecutors.
Footage shared on social media of the alleged incident appears to show three unarmed figures collapsing from a stationary position after being fired upon. Reuters could not independently verify the video.
The Airborne Assault Troops said unidentified enemy personnel, “acting intentionally, in violation of the laws and customs of war,” had deliberately killed the three men, whom it described as captured members of its 82nd Airborne Assault Brigade.
It said their bodies had been removed by Ukrainian authorities from the scene, previously identified as being near the village of Robotyne in Ukraine’s southeastern Zaporizhzhia region.
The Airborne Assault Troops reshared the footage of the incident, marking three men with Ukrainian flags and placing Russian flags next to uniformed figures standing or crouching at two locations on a barren landscape some distance behind the three.
The three men are seen on their knees, hands behind their heads. At least two uniformed individuals raise what appear to be weapons from the two Russian-flagged locations and appear to open fire in the direction of the Ukrainians.
Immediately the three tumble forwards, and a man identified as a Russian soldier approaches them and appears to check for signs of life as they lie on the earth.
“This is another case of a gross violation by the aggressor country of international humanitarian law regarding the treatment of prisoners of war,” the prosecutor’s office said when it announced its investigation on Wednesday.
Ukraine on Dec. 3 accused Russia of committing a war crime after another video shared on social media appeared to show several soldiers shooting two surrendering military personnel who emerged from a dugout at gunpoint.
Last March, a captured Ukrainian soldier was seen being shot dead in a video after defiantly saying “Glory to Ukraine,” a phrase that has taken on special significance as a common public greeting since the start of the war.
(Reporting by Oleksandr Kozhukhar in Kyiv and Elaine Monaghan in Washington; Editing by Rosalba O’Brien)

author: Martín Cojal Cabrera
title: Imágenes Feliz Día de Reyes 2024 con mensajes para dedicar por redes sociales
text:
Este sábado 6 de enero marca la
celebración del Día de Reyes 2024, una festividad impregnada de colores y profundas tradiciones que también se vive en México y en diversas naciones de Latinoamérica. Las familias acostumbran conmemorar la llegada de los Reyes Magos a través del intercambio de regalos, sumergiéndose en la alegría y expresando buenos deseos para el nuevo año que comienza. ¿Te preguntas cómo transmitir tu afecto a tus seres queridos en esta ocasión tan especial? En Depor, compartimos las mejores imágenes y hermosos con mensajes para que puedas compartir y disfrutar en esta festividad.
Según la tradición cristiana, los Reyes Magos, también conocidos como Melchor, Gaspar y Baltasar, llegaron a Belén siguiendo la estrella de Belén para adorar al recién nacido Jesús y presentarle regalos de gran significado simbólico: oro, incienso y mirra. La llegada de los Reyes Magos es un tema central en la celebración de la Epifanía, que conmemora la manifestación de Jesús como el Salvador y la revelación de su divinidad a los gentiles.
En varias culturas, esta festividad se celebra con diversas tradiciones, como la entrega de regalos a los niños, la elaboración de la rosca de Reyes, y en algunos lugares, eventos y desfiles para recrear la llegada de los Reyes Magos. La celebración varía según las costumbres locales y las prácticas culturales.
En algunas regiones de México, se llevan a cabo procesiones religiosas y eventos comunitarios para conmemorar la llegada de los Reyes Magos. Estos eventos suelen incluir música, danzas, y representaciones teatrales relacionadas con la historia de Melchor, Gaspar y Baltasar. Asimismo, muchas comunidades celebran con fuegos artificiales y eventos festivos locales para agregar alegría y color a la festividad.
Imágenes para dedicar por el Día de Reyes 2024
Frases y mensajes por el Día de Reyes para compartir en Instagram, WhatsApp y Facebook
- Que la gloria del Señor esté contigo y llene tu corazón. Que tengas una bendita Epifanía.
- Padre, te damos gracias por revelarte a nosotros en Jesús. Feliz Reyes Magos.
- Te deseo a ti y a tu familia un santo y bendecido Día de Reyes.
- Que la luz de esa estrella maravillosa brille sobre ti y te guíe.
- Envío tres Reyes Magos a tu hogar para llenar tu casa de bendiciones
- “La ilusión y la fantasía son los mejores regalos que podemos brindar a nuestros hijos en el Día de Reyes.” - Mario Vargas Llosa
- “La magia está en el brillo de los ojos de los niños al recibir sus regalos en el Día de Reyes.” - Gabriel García Márquez
- “En el Día de Reyes, celebremos el amor, la unión familiar y la generosidad que nos brinda esta fecha tan especial.” - Isabel Allende
- “Los Reyes Magos nos recuerdan la importancia de mantener viva la ilusión y la esperanza en nuestros corazones.” - Jorge Luis Borges
- “En este día, recordemos que la verdadera felicidad se encuentra en la alegría de dar y en el amor compartido.” - Paulo Coelho
¿Cuáles son las tradiciones de la celebración del día de Bajada de Reyes en México?
La festividad del Día de la Bajada de Reyes en México destaca por sus arraigadas tradiciones culturales. En el centro de la celebración está la reunión familiar para compartir la rosca de Reyes, un pan dulce decorado con frutas cristalizadas que esconde una figurilla del Niño Jesús.
Quien encuentra la figurilla se convierte en padrino o madrina de las festividades de la Candelaria. La tradición simboliza la búsqueda de Jesús por los Reyes Magos, y el gesto de encontrar la figurilla en la rosca es considerado un honor especial. Los niños reciben regalos como muestra de generosidad, evocando los regalos que los Reyes Magos llevaron al Niño Jesús. En algunas regiones, la celebración incluye procesiones religiosas y eventos comunitarios que conmemoran esta fecha especial.
TE PUEDE INTERESAR
Calendario 2024 de México: ver días festivos, puentes y todos los feriados del próximo año Nuevo Registro de Mujeres con Bienestar: cuándo comienza la segunda etapa https://depor.com/temblor-hoy-mexico-ultimos-sismos-epicentro-magnitud-servicio-sismologico/ Megafarmacia Bienestar: cuándo, cómo y quiénes pueden acceder

author: KCTV5 Staff
title: KC man sentenced for sex trafficking 4 victims, including 2 minors
text:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. (KCTV) - A Kansas City man was sentenced in federal court Thursday for his role in a sex trafficking conspiracy that involved four victims, including two teenagers.
The man, 30-year-old Dameon Devor Williams was sentenced to 16 years in federal prison without parole. He was also sentenced to 20 years of supervised release following incarceration.
Williams pleaded guilty on June 29, 2023, to one count of conspiracy to engage in sex trafficking and one count of sex trafficking.
He admitted in court documents that he participated in a sex-trafficking conspiracy from August 2018 until January 2019 that caused four victims to engage in prostitution with one of the victims being 14 years old and another victim being 16 years old.
On Jan. 7, 2019, Homeland Security Investigations agents in Kansas City received a tip about a 14-year-old female who was missing. The girl had previously been apprehended in Blue Springs after a crash involving a stolen vehicle. When the girl was taken to Children’s Mercy Hospital she reported that she’d been forced to have sex for money.
With that report, the hospital took her personal belongings and gave them to federal agents. The agents used the phone to identify a 16-year-old girl a couple days later in Jackson, Mississippi.
Court documents said that victim helped police locate the first victim at a residence in Kansas City, Mo.
Agents set up surveillance at a Kansas City apartment building and later located and arrested co-defendant Cory Lavell Smith. One of the victims said Smith groomed her into the commercial sex trade and that Williams also set up transactions. Court documents said Smith and Williams split the money earned from the transactions.
Smith pleaded guilty to the same charges and was sentenced on Nov. 1, 2022, to 18 years in federal prison without parole.
Copyright 2024 KCTV. All rights reserved.

author: @foxsports
title: Florida State players see a path to championship consideration
text: Florida State players see a path to championship consideration [No. 5 ] [Florida State](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/florida-state-seminoles-team) (13-0, 9-0 in [ACC](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/acc) play) feels that it was robbed of an appearance in the 2023 [College Football](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football) Playoff, but some members of the team still see a path for the Seminoles to stake a claim to being the top team in the nation. Quarterback [Brock Glenn](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/brock-glenn-player), who started for Florida State in its ACC championship game victory over then-No. 14 [Louisville](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/louisville-cardinals-team), asserted that the Seminoles should " [absolutely](https://www.espn.com/college-football/story/_/id/39197384/florida-state-champions-only-undefeated-team-players-say)" be considered the national champions if they're the last remaining undefeated Power 5 school at the conclusion of the College Football Playoff. Linebacker [Kalen DeLoach](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/kalen-deloach-player) concurs with the sentiment. "It's only right. Nothing else needs to be said if we're the only undefeated team," [DeLoach told ESPN](https://www.espn.com/college-football/story/_/id/39197384/florida-state-champions-only-undefeated-team-players-say). Ahead of Florida State is a matchup against No. 6 [Georgia](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/georgia-bulldogs-team) (12-1 overall, 8-1 in [SEC](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/sec) play) in the Orange Bowl. Glenn wants the Seminoles to make a statement in the high-profile bowl game. "The Orange Bowl is an awesome bowl, one of the best in the country, and we have a great opportunity in front of us playing Georgia," Glenn said. "It's still a big game for us, and we're taking it serious. We're focused on the guys we have here to help us win the game." Florida State spent the bulk of the 2023 season in the top four of the College Football Playoff rankings. It slipped to No. 5 after the final week of the regular season and couldn't crack the playoff despite winning the ACC. A season-ending knee injury to star quarterback [Jordan Travis](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/jordan-travis-2-player) in Week 12 presumably dented Florida State's playoff aspirations, as did then-No. 8 [Alabama](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/alabama-crimson-tide-team) beating then-No. 1 Georgia in the SEC championship. While ending the season on a high note against the back-to-back national champion Bulldogs is admirable, the Seminoles will be without several pillars; defensive lineman [Jared Verse](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/jared-verse-player), running back [Trey Benson](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/trey-benson-player) and wide receivers [Keon Coleman](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/keon-coleman-player), [Johnny Wilson](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/johnny-wilson-player) and [Jaheim Bell](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/jaheim-bell-player) are among the 20-plus Florida State players to opt out of playing in the Orange Bowl. With that in mind, FOX Bet lists Georgia as a 20-point favorite. For Florida State to finish as the lone undefeated Power 5 team, it would need No. 1 [Michigan](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/michigan-wolverines-team) (13-0 overall, 10-0 in [Big Ten](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/big-ten) play) and No. 2 [Washington](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/washington-huskies-team) (13-0 overall, 10-0 in [Pac-12](https://www.foxsports.com/college-football/pac-12) play) to each lose at some point in the College Football Playoff. [Want great stories delivered right to your inbox?
